desc.gc: <0><0>グッドクリエイト社のソフトウェアエンジニアリング部門を担当しています。 要件について話し合い、技術的なアドバイスを提供し、高レベルのソリューションを提案します。<1>SwiftとKotlinを使用して高度にインタラクティブなモバイルアプリケーションを開発しました。<2><1>アプリ構築システムを担当しています。 ユーザーがプログラミングの知識がなくても独自のモバイルアプリケーションを構築できるようにします。 ReactNativeを搭載します。<3>私は研究開発活動を行っています。将来のプロジェクトでのFlutterの潜在的な使用法を探ります。<4>WordpressとWelcartを使用して<1>EコマースWebサイトを開発しました
desc.jpschool:
<0><0>I took 2-years course, but I graduated early, only study there for 1 year.<1>I started with almost zero Japanese and was able to pass JLPT N3 before graduation. Two years later I passed JLPT N2.<2>I can communicate in Japanese at business level. I am able to discuss technical topic in Japanese with minimal difficulty. <3>I can act as English-Japanese-Vietnamese interpreter at conversational level.
I can interpret business Japanese to some degree.
desc.glhan: <0><0>I have taken part in Gameloft AI Contest 2013, I finished at Quater Final (rank #4~8).I soon joined Gameloft later on March 2014.<1>Deeply immersed in international environment, my English ability improved significantly. Thanks to that, earlier in 2021, I took the TOEIC English test and achieved 945/990 points.<2>Started out as a C++ Game Programmer, I developed my interest in Computer Graphics. I am in charge of gameplay programming and graphics optimization for games. I am well trained in OpenGL, shader programming and various graphics debugging tools.<3>I was in charge of gameplay programming and graphics optimization in the following games (all based on C++ and OpenGL):<1><0>Sharkdash, built using 2D in-house engine.<1>Ice Age Adventures, built using in-house 3D engine. <2>Brothers in Arms 3, built using Irrlicht-based in-house engine (3D).<3>Order and Chaos 2, 3D MMORPG, built using in-house engine.<4>Disney Magic Kingdom, built using Irrlicht-based in-house engine (3D).
desc.fpt: <0><0>I joined FPT Software on June 2016 and lead a team of 5 challenging a C++ project with 2 millions lines of code.That was a migration project, bringing an old 32-bit based system to 64-bit. I was in charge of building custom developement tools (CLI) for the team. I did review other member's code to ensure source code quality.<1>I developed application for an entertainment system running on Automobile devices (in parnership with LG).That was media playing application, built with Qt. I am in charge of feature implementation and overall performance optimization.<2>Over the course of 2 years at FPT Software, I have received various training on Project Management. I learned how to manage a small team and was pretty successful at it.<3>I was received honorable mention as Best Rookie of The Year 2016.
desc.university: <0><0>My major was Software Engineering. Over the course of 4 years, I was well trained with C/C++, C#. I got perfect mark (10/10) in Computer Programming, Semester Project #4.I have most major subjects above A grade (8.0+/10), with A+ in Graduation Project (9.2/10).<1>I aced an university programming contest. Both as an individual and as a team.<2>I represented my university taking part in National Olympiad of Informatics. I got an incentive prize.<3>My team represented my university taking part in ACM/ICPC.
